message.entry: Invalid number of arguments. To create an {0}, specify {1,number,integer} or fewer arguments.
Expected an {0} on the right-hand side, but got {1} instead.
Error using cat. The dimension must be a real, scalar, positive integer.
Error using cat. Expected all inputs to be of type {0}, but found type {1}.
Expected all inputs to be of type {0}, but found type {1}.
{1} is not a valid underlying class for {0}. Choose either 'single' or 'double'.
All arguments must be transformations, rotations, or numeric.
Arrays have incompatible sizes for this operation.
Expected a transformation or rotation as the first argument in cast(a, 'like', b).
One argument to {0} must be scalar.
{0} requires both operands to be transformations or rotations (of the same type).
Expected the number of rotations and translations to be the same or 1 for one of them. Instead, found {0,number,integer} rotations and {1,number,integer} translations.
